 * initialize the form.
 * WARNING: Do NOT modify this code. The content of this method is
 * always regenerated by the Form Editor.

// <editor-fold defaultstate="collapsed" desc="Generated Code">//GEN-BEGIN:initComponents
private void initComponents() {
    statusBar = new JPanel();
    caretInfoLabel = new JLabel();
    scrollPane = new JScrollPane();
    setLayout(new BorderLayout());
    statusBar.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
    caretInfoLabel.setFont(new Font("Lucida Grande", 0, 11));
    caretInfoLabel.setText("1:1");
    caretInfoLabel.setBorder(BorderFactory.createEmptyBorder(1, 3, 0, 3));
    statusBar.add(caretInfoLabel, BorderLayout.CENTER);
    add(statusBar, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
    scrollPane.setBorder(null);
    scrollPane.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(ScrollPaneConstants.VERTICAL_SCROLLBAR_ALWAYS);
    add(scrollPane, BorderLayout.CENTER);
}// </editor-fold>//GEN-END:initComponents
